---
title: Software citations
nocite: "`r paste0('@', targets::tar_read(softbib_keys), collapse = ', ')`"
bibliography: softbib.bib
---



```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
things_to_exclude <- c("base", "tools", "rstudioapi", "bookdown", 
                       "mgcv", "pingr", "rlang", "shiny", "shinybusy", 
                       "shinyWidgets", "withr")

keys <- softbib(exclude = things_to_exclude, output = NULL)
paste0("@", keys, collapse = ", ")

asdf <- softbib(exclude = things_to_exclude, output = "softbib.bib", 
        output_dir = here::here("notebook"))

```
